name: Intelligence
effect: :instant: During Combat, before any [unit](../units/index.md) activates, play a [Spell](../spells/index.md) card. You can still only play a [Spell](../spells/index.md) card during a Combat round.
expert_effect: :instant: During Combat, before any [unit](../units/index.md) activates, play a [Spell](../spells/index.md) card. This spell does not count toward your spell limit per Combat round.
